name: Cat Quest (itch) (Saheli Basu)
description:
Thank you for checking out this game!

This is a simple platformer game where a cat moves across the platform using keys

  • a : backward movement
  • d : forward movement
  • spacebar : jump

to hunt fish and defeating enemies encountered on the way.

The points awarded for catching fish bones is 1 whereas for catching full body fishes is 4.

Defeating enemies fetches 5 points in addition.

This is the basic work and developments are going on for improving the gameplay in the subsequent versions.

Stay safe !

Saheli Basu
